title: Modern Family's Sarah Hyland asks Vanessa Hudgens to be her bridesmaid
text:
Sarah Hyland asks Vanessa Hudgens to be her bridesmaid (Picture: Getty Images)

Modern Family star Sarah Hyland has asked Vanessa Hudgens to be her bridesmaid.

The A-listers have been BFFs for quite some time, and it seems the soon-to-be bride wants the actress close to her side on the special day.

Taking to Instagram, the High School Musical star shared the news with her 35.7million followers.

Here she posted up a picture of a wooden box, that was adorned with ribbons and golden leaves.

Scrawled across the front was the word ‘Vanessa’ with ‘bridesmaid’ written across the bottom of the snap, and it’s just too cute.

Vanessa documented the moment on Instagram (Picture: Vanessa Hudgens / Instagram)

Sarah recently announced her engagement to Wells Adams, who she started dating back in September 2017.

The Bachelor alum proposed during a romantic beach holiday, back in July, and documented the adorable moment on their social media.

Sharing several snaps Sarah wrote: ‘That can’t eat, can’t sleep, reach for the stars, over the fence, world series kind of stuff.’

Wells also posted a video of the proposal, adding: ‘I’ll be Johnny, you be June. But forever – Drew Holcomb & The Neighbors.’

Sarah has been dating Wells Adams for more than two years (Picture: Getty Images)

The loved up couple met just three days after Sarah’s second kidney transplant following her battle with kidney dysplasia.

However, her future hubby has previously said that meeting after the star’s operation didn’t affect how much he loved her.

‘With her health issues and stuff, everyone goes through things in their lives, it just so happened that when we started dating she was going through a very big thing,’ he told ET Online in January.

‘It’s not hard to love her. She’s gorgeous and beautiful and smart and talented.’

He added: ‘It was nice that I was able to help her with her issue, but there will be times when I need her help.’
